name: vanta-io
description: Plataforma de perfis personalizados - Pronto para Squarespace Cloud

scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy' && git push squarespace main
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install --omit=dev --no-audit --no-fund || true && cd ../frontend && npm install --no-audit --no-fund && npm run build || true

author: Vanta.io
